metadata.title: Focusrite Scarlett vs Universal Audio Volt 2025: Audio Interfaces
metadata.description: Compare Focusrite Scarlett and Universal Audio Volt interfaces. Which is better for YouTube?

hero.headline: Focusrite Scarlett vs Universal Audio Volt
hero.subheadline: Two top audio interface brands. Clean vs character for your YouTube audio.

sections.content: Focusrite Scarlett and Universal Audio Volt are the most recommended interfaces for content creators. Scarlett is known for clean, transparent sound. Volt offers vintage character. Both produce excellent YouTube audio—here's how to choose.

content.title: Clean Transparency
content.description: What goes in comes out. Neutral preamps.

content.title: Extensive Bundle
content.description: Tons of included plugins and software.

content.title: Vintage Mode
content.description: 610 tube preamp emulation. Flattering on voice.

content.title: Retro Styling
content.description: Looks great on camera. YouTube background friendly.

faq.question: Which sounds better for voice?
faq.answer: Subjective. Volt's vintage mode flatters most voices immediately. Scarlett is neutral—add warmth in post. Both excellent. Different approaches.

faq.question: Are they reliable?
faq.answer: Both very reliable. Scarlett has longer track record, massive user base. Volt is newer but UA has excellent reputation.

faq.question: Do I need 2i2 or Solo?
faq.answer: Solo (1 input) is fine for single mic. 2i2 (2 inputs) useful for interviews, future flexibility. Price difference small—consider 2i2.

faq.question: What about latency?
faq.answer: Both have excellent low-latency performance. Suitable for real-time monitoring. No significant difference for YouTube use.
